item.title: GhCYP703A2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ghir D12G012350.1 Gene Symbol: GhCYP703A2 Gene Name: Genome: Gossypium hirsutum (TM-1) reference genome Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cytochrome P450 mono-oxygenase CYP703A2 plays a central role in sporopollenin formation and ms5ms6 fertility in cotton.
